love

Girl: Slow down, I'm scared.

Guy: No, this is fun.

Girl: No it's not. Please it's too scary!

Guy: Then tell me you love me.

Girl: Fine I love you. Slow down!

Guy: Now give me a BIG hug.

Girl : *hugs him*

Guy: Can you take my helmet off and put it on yourself? It's bugging me.

Girl: Alright, now slow down

Guy: I love you babe

(in the paper the next day):
A motorcycle had crashed into a building because of brake failure. Two people were on it, but only 1 had survived.

The truth was that halfway down the road, the guy realized that his brakes broke, but he didn't want to let the girl know. Instead, he had her say she loved him and felt her hug one last time, then he had her wear his helmet so that she would live even though it meant that he would die.

the wreck of the hesperus

It was the schooner Hesperus,
That sailed the wintery sea;
And the skipper had taken his little daughter,
To bear him company.

Blue were her eyes as the fairy flax,
Her cheeks like the dawn of day,
And her bosom white as the hawthorn buds,
That ope in the month of May.

The Skipper he stood beside the helm,
His pipe was in his mouth,
And he watched how the veering flaw did blow
The smoke now West, now South.

Then up and spake an old Sailor,
Had sailed the Spanish Main,
"I pray thee, put into yonder port,
for I fear a hurricane.

"Last night the moon had a golden ring,
And to-night no moon we see!"
The skipper, he blew whiff from his pipe,
And a scornful laugh laughed he.

Colder and louder blew the wind,
A gale from the Northeast,
The snow fell hissing in the brine,
And the billows frothed like yeast.

Down came the storm, and smote amain
The vessel in its strength;
She shuddered and paused, like a frighted steed,
Then leaped her cable's length.

"Come hither! come hither! my little daughter,
And do not tremble so;
For I can weather the roughest gale
That ever wind did blow."

He wrapped her warm in his seaman's coat
Against the stinging blast;
He cut a rope from a broken spar,
And bound her to the mast.

"O father! I hear the church bells ring,
Oh, say, what may it be?"
"Tis a fog-bell on a rock bound coast!" --
And he steered for the open sea.

"O father! I hear the sound of guns;
Oh, say, what may it be?"
Some ship in distress, that cannot live
In such an angry sea!"

"O father! I see a gleaming light.
Oh say, what may it be?"
But the father answered never a word,
A frozen corpse was he.

Lashed to the helm, all stiff and stark,
With his face turned to the skies,
The lantern gleamed through the gleaming snow
On his fixed and glassy eyes.

Then the maiden clasped her hands and prayed
That saved she might be;
And she thought of Christ, who stilled the wave,
On the Lake of Galilee.

And fast through the midnight dark and drear,
Through the whistling sleet and snow,
Like a sheeted ghost, the vessel swept
Tow'rds the reef of Norman's Woe.

And ever the fitful gusts between
A sound came from the land;
It was the sound of the trampling surf,
On the rocks and hard sea-sand.

The breakers were right beneath her bows,
She drifted a dreary wreck,
And a whooping billow swept the crew
Like icicles from her deck.

She struck where the white and fleecy waves
Looked soft as carded wool,
But the cruel rocks, they gored her side
Like the horns of an angry bull.

Her rattling shrouds, all sheathed in ice,
With the masts went by the board;
Like a vessel of glass, she stove and sank,
Ho! ho! the breakers roared!

At daybreak, on the bleak sea-beach,
A fisherman stood aghast,
To see the form of a maiden fair,
Lashed close to a drifting mast.

The salt sea was frozen on her breast,
The salt tears in her eyes;
And he saw her hair, like the brown sea-weed,
On the billows fall and rise.

Such was the wreck of the Hesperus,
In the midnight and the snow!
Christ save us all from a death like this,
On the reef of Norman's Woe!

girls talking about my little sister lil bitches her age

i love you so much morgan, rip jordan lee snyder

today i put myself in my sisters place and i hated it because i wouldn't have bin able to deal with it. you see 2 octobers ago late in the month my sister morgan who was only 16 at the time lost her boyfreind in a car accedent he didn't die instantly they guess he was wait for held form a few hours but he suffered from massive head trama and several broken bones but the main reason he died was because he was chewing gum he inhailed the gum and the three hour he was waiting he wasn't breathing right and couldn't even get oxygen to the brain to help the brain damage. he was life flighted to st. johns hospial and was treated and the scaned and he had only 8 brain wave things i guess that not hardly any for a normal person but weeks passed morgan suffered and grew more, and more hopless because he wasn't getting any better and jordan had even said a few weeks before the crash he would never want to be kept alive if he wasnt goin to get better ever and jordan was in a coma and not showing any progess in 3 weeks his parents, his mother and fother had to decide to pull the plug. what a horrible dicision that was it killed his parents to have to set there child free in such a way. and months and months and months after jordans death morgan still crys and screams out in the night in her horrible night mairs. i was her closest sister and we really really were and there wasn't anything i could do accept ask god why but i guess its a part of some kind of a plan and i hope so and i wanted his plan for morgan to get better
and it didn't it got worse and then in early december late november maddie had a huge family tragity and it killed me to have to watch the 2 most important friends i had go threw such hard times and then due to maddie's problem she had to leave and go live with her dad in missouri and didn't get to come back for good ontil summer.morgan is doing better now shes never bin the same though and it tears me up sometimes because i miss her oldself alot but i'll be okay now shes dating a total asshole that so mean to her and i hate him and oh guess what few months back at the begining of the year he got into a bad car accedent too and she was riped i mean i hurt me so horribly but he lived and got away with 2brokend legs a broken arm and shattered jaw and messed up nose. i only wish i could help her and anyone that these kind of things happed to but i do all i can and i no for a fact thats not enough it may help some but i only wish i had the power to fix it so no one had to go threw this ever. if i ever had to be in her possition back then idk what i would do i mean i put the guys who i love so much in jordans spot and thats where i got that poem haha i hope tony doesn't fine that offening because it wasn't a very good poem but still i just had to get some of this heart ache out it's not healthy to hold it all it and i'm here for anyone that ever needs to say anything or just feels loney and needs someone to talk to i'm here so your not alone i wish everyone could read this so that they would know that. so love like there isn't going to be tomarrow and if you love someone tell them everywaking moment dont hold it in because u'll never know if you wont get to tell them.

call this blog w/e u want idc

wow i hate this and by this i mean the feeling i hate right now. i know this guy from outa town and hes such a cool guy i mean great personality really funny and fun to talk to not the best record i'm sure but still i hate it that hes so sad latly i used to talk to him all the time and laugh and have fun and everything but i haven't gotten much of a rise out of him in a long time and i hate that, i hate it that in this year alone he has lost about 3or 4 ppl that were very close to him and hes bin hurt just like countless times and i HATE it that there isn't anything in the whole wide world that i can say there isn't a fucking thing on earth i can say to make it better and it truly sucks. he has had many of his friends comit sucide in the pat years which is hard and nobody will ever understand that kind of pain if they haven't. idk but i hate it when thing like that happen and...
what do u say.
u can't there isn't anythign you can say and if you dont know that then you say ur sry or ur there for them or it's okay
IT'S NOT OKAY!!! its not and for the person on the receiving end of this conversation i mean they take some comfort in those words and its lets them know you care but the point is that there still sad, and thats what i hate is ppl being so sad...and ya no what i can't do anything i can hug them and tell them that i love them and try to help but i mean honestly when ppl offer me up help when i'm hurt most of the time i push them out and tell them i'm okay and go on and carry it all with with me for so long and i mean later yeah sure why not i'll talk about it and stuff but mean, idk if anyone is getting what i'm saying. i'm not saying you should never try to help someone in pail fuck no lol i mean u can work your ass off and should to make them feel better.what kills me though is prolly the anger that comes with the saddness i mean you say"hey man i'm really sry, and i'm here for you." and i mean some ppl will thank you for your concern but other will just get angry and i understand think of thing from there point of veiw and i do thank them for there concern and all but for the most part i dont think they understand whats going on and all and alot of the time they dont but i would cry if i did but i can't really say how warm it felt to hear a boy sitting behinde me tell her to shut up and tell her she didn't know anything at all so she needed to stop talking. idk but anyone out there ever get that alone feeling i mean i know lots of ppl do but i'm here ur not alone u can think you r but ur not ur never alone i learned that from a really close friend of mine he idk but if i died RIGHT NOW. wut would you think wut would be going over in your mind? would you be upset or just kinda like o w/e i mean i didn't really know her but thats sad and all dude. if i died right now idk wut would you think or feel like you missed out on telling me somthing...would you cry?idk if you would if not then i mean thats okay too i would like ppl to remember me for the laughs they got outa me lol thats good.do you think if you were a dude would you be disapointed you spent so much time on all those other girls and would you be like "wow i'm glad i told her i loved her with all my heart" or would you be like"yeah i said i loved her but i wish i would have known her well enough to have ment it" how long do you think it would be for it to hit you that i'm gone and i'm never coming back. how long would it take you to miss me? how much would you miss me of would you just be all omg addis dead and then in a week you all addi who?would you come to my funeral with a heavy heart full of once had happy memories or would you be there just to get off work or out of school? would you tell you children about me someday?or would it be like just something way in the past. do you think you would dwell on my death? the way i would have died would you think you could have stoped it but you just let it happen and if so y didn't you?I'm not writing this in a form of some sign that i wanna die i just think about those questions alot................
